trans-unit.source: Contains information about an ink gesture.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关墨迹笔势的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> contains an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> and the level of likeliness that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> correctly identified the gesture.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>包含<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>和的可能性大小，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>正确识别笔势。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> property to determine the level of likeliness that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> correctly identified the gesture.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A>属性来确定的可能性大小，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>正确识别笔势。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to identify a gesture on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何在识别手势<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event has been connected to the event handler in the code.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`且其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件已连接到代码中的事件处理程序。
获取已识别的墨迹笔势。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to identify a gesture on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何在识别手势<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event has been connected to the event handler in the code.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`且其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件已连接到代码中的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of confidence that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> has in the recognition of the gesture.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> 识别笔势的置信度。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to identify a gesture on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何在识别手势<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event has been connected to the event handler in the code.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`且其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件已连接到代码中的事件处理程序。
